step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to keep your shoulders and elbows a little more stable as you get into position.
You're doing well with the breathing. Focus on keeping your shoulders and elbows steady during this step.
Excellent inhale and muscle tightening! Keep your elbows and wrists a bit more still to maximize the effect.
Great exhale and relaxation! Try to minimize any movement in your elbows and wrists as you relax.
Good job on the second rep! Let's aim for even more stability in your shoulders and elbows as you begin.
You're breathing deeply. Focus on keeping your shoulders and elbows steady throughout this step.
Well done on the inhale and muscle squeeze! Keep your elbows and wrists as still as possible.
Fantastic exhale and release! Minimize any elbow and wrist movement for the best results.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to keep your whole body muscles tight on the inhale and relaxed on the exhale. Focus on minimizing movement in your elbows and wrists for even better lymphatic stimulation.
